about.title: Content Fiction
about.content: Quality Content Helps You Generate Backlinks - One of the best SEO strategies is to gain high-quality backlinks from high-authority websites. ... It also involves creating a website that has a good structure that users can navigate easily, optimizing your robots. txt files, and writing good meta tags.

writing.title: Writing
writing.content: The ultimate goal of everything we do is getting your website on the first page of Google for as many relevant keywords as possible. We'll unearth the questions people are asking Google using a variety of analysis tools we have available to us. We then narrow the list down based on how difficult it will be to rank for each keyword. Each search term we identify as having enough monthly search volume for it to be economical to target formulates the foundation of one article. That article will become the definite answer to the searcher’s question. Our writers extensively research the topics they are given to produce articles that are not only optimised for search engines but engage, excite and answer people’s questions.
